title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Changing Exhibitions
body: Changing Exhibitions       Changing exhibitions of contemporary art are sponsored annually by the Trustees of the Saint-Gaudens Memorial. Exhibits are located in the Picture Gallery, which is open daily from 9:00 - 4:30 during the run of the exhibit. Exhibits are included with park admission. There is no admission fee for the opening receptions and the artist talk that evening.   2016 PICTURE GALLERY EXHIBITIONS  May 28 - July 18 Kirsten Hassenfeld,  2014 Saint-Gaudens Fellow  Arrangements Opening reception: May 28 at 4:30 to 6:00 p.m. Artist's talk at 5:00 p.m.  July 23 - August 30 Lynne Harlow  SONG Opening reception: July 23 at 4:30 to 6:00 p.m. Artist's talk at 5:00 p.m.   September 10 - October 31 Candice Ivy Within Above Below the Skin Opening reception: September 10 at 4:30 to 6:00 p.m. Artist's talk at 5:00 p.m.
